dustite_collection.name: Dustite Collection
dustite_collection.description: Our refinery needs a fresh supply of Dustite to keep production running. Head to the belts and mine what we need.
dustite_collection.briefing: Pilot, we're running low on Dustite stocks. Head out to the nefleurett asteroid belt and bring back 1000 units. Simple work, but essential for our operations.

ferrite_run.name: Ferrite Mining Run
ferrite_run.description: We need Ferrite for our mineral processing operations. Mine the required amount and return.
ferrite_run.briefing: Ferrite is a valuable ore containing both Ferrium and Ignium. We need 800 units delivered to this station. Get to the belts and start mining.

ignaite_extraction.name: Ignaite Extraction
ignaite_extraction.description: Our manufacturing division requires Ignaite for advanced production. Extract the ore from designated asteroid fields.
ignaite_extraction.briefing: Ignaite contains Noctium, a mineral we desperately need for tech II component production. Mine 1500 units from the asteroid belts and return to station.

crystite_harvest.name: Crystite Harvest
crystite_harvest.description: A large order for Crystite has come in. We need experienced miners to fill it.
crystite_harvest.briefing: One of our corporate clients needs a bulk delivery of Crystite. Mine 2000 units and bring them back to this station. A mining barge is recommended for this volume.

corite_survey.name: Corite Survey
corite_survey.description: We've located Corite deposits in nearby belts. Survey the area and extract the ore.
corite_survey.briefing: Corite is a mid-grade ore rich in Allonium and Isodium. We need 1200 units mined and delivered. Survey the asteroid belts to find the richest deposits.

lumine_deep_mining.name: Lumine Deep Mining Operation
lumine_deep_mining.description: Lumine deposits have been found in lowsec space. Extract the ore, but be prepared for hostile encounters.
lumine_deep_mining.briefing: We've identified rich Lumine deposits in a lowsec system. The ore is extremely valuable, but the area is dangerous. Mine 2500 units and return safely. Watch your directional scanner at all times.

sangite_expedition.name: Sangite Expedition
sangite_expedition.description: An expedition to mine Sangite from deep asteroid fields. This ore is critical for advanced manufacturing.
sangite_expedition.briefing: Sangite is a rare ore that yields Noctium and Isodium in large quantities. We're sending you on an expedition to mine 3000 units. The asteroid fields are deep in contested space.

glacite_recovery.name: Glacite Recovery Mission
glacite_recovery.description: Recover Glacite from an asteroid field that has attracted pirate attention. Expect NPC defense spawns.
glacite_recovery.briefing: We have a Glacite-rich asteroid field that pirates have been using as a staging area. Mine 2000 units of Glacite while defending yourself from NPC spawns. Bring combat drones or an escort.

cosmite_extraction.name: Cosmite Deep Extraction
cosmite_extraction.description: Extract Cosmite from a nullsec asteroid field. Enemy NPC waves will attempt to disrupt your operation.
cosmite_extraction.briefing: Cosmite is one of the most valuable ores in Astralis, found only in nullsec space. We need 5000 units extracted from a field deep in hostile territory. Expect multiple waves of NPC enemies attempting to drive you off. A well-fitted Exhumer with combat support is essential.

nexorite_critical.name: Critical Nexorite Acquisition
nexorite_critical.description: Mine Nexorite using specialized mining crystals. This rare ore is essential for Tech II production and requires expert mining skills.
nexorite_critical.briefing: Nexorite is the rfleurett and most dangerous ore to mine. It requires specialized deep core mining equipment and Nexorite mining crystals. We need 2000 units for a critical Tech II manufacturing contract. The fields are in nullsec and heavily contested. This is the most challenging mining operation we offer.
